I definitely agree. Theirs was a very unique relationship, not the 
fluffy =
kind or the shy type. It was a nice breath of fresh air in my 
opinion. It =
was funny how they understood each other and showed it 
in not so -normal- =
ways. I mean who says she doesn't know what will 
happen to her after she d=
ies? And her knight in shining armor comes 
along and says join me. LOL! Wh=
ile I re-watched that I got 
goosebumps.

Oh Sec... Saitou was there overhe=
aring the conversation. I'm not 
sure if it's just me but... I have this na=
gging feeling that SK was 
saying that not only for Oume but for Saitou to =
hear it (hopefully 
to fulfil that wish)? Wasn't it at that point that SK a=
lready knew 
he would be dying soon, which is why he was so open to Oume ab=
out 
it? LOL!
